Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui.controllers

Class CharacterInfoController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui.controllers.GuiController
it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui.controllers.CharacterInfoController
public class CharacterInfoController extends GuiController
Displays the detailed description of the characters' abilities.
